agents.name: Research & Planning Agent
agents.why: These are research-heavy, require literature review, and can be planned in parallel while the core engine is built.

agents.name: Infrastructure Planning Agent
agents.why: These require domain expertise research, dataset analysis, and can be planned while core algorithms are being built.

agents.name: Performance & Scaling Agent
agents.why: These are infrastructure-heavy and can be researched/planned while core development is happening.
